Monday - Thursday: 10:30 am - 12:00 am Friday: 10:30 am - 9:00 pm Saturday - Sunday: Closed
*Hours of operation are subject to change for observed holidays and breaks.

Brandywine Commons is one of our three all-you-can-eat dining halls, located off of Ring Road by Middle Earth and Social Science Tower (SST), featuring made-to-order burgers and deli sandwiches, home-style favorites, shakes, seasonal selections and student favorites!

Monday - Friday Breakfast: 7:15 am - 10:00 am Continental: 10:00 am - 11:00 am Lunch: 11:00 am - 2:00 pm Light Lunch 2:00 pm 4:30 pm Dinner: 4:30 pm - 8:00 pm
Saturday & Sunday Continental: 9:30 am - 11:00 am Brunch: 11:00 am - 3:00 pm Dinner: 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm
Pippin Commons East Peltason Drive Irvine, CA 92617
Pippin Commons is one of three of our all-you-can-eat dining halls, featuring full service breakfast, lunch and dinner with international entrées, grill, deli, salad bar and more!

December 12th - December 18th Mon-Thu: 8am-4pm Fri: 8am-3pm Sat & Sun: Closed

Located inside the Hebert Gavin Eye Institute, the 20/20 Cafe is a We Proudly Serve Starbucks that offers a variety of beverages and pastries

Paul Merage School of Business Irvine, CA 92697

Located in the Paul Merage School of Business, Au Bon Pain is a fast-casual bakery and café chain specializing in breakfast, hot and cold sandwiches, wraps, salads, soups and pastries. Whether you are looking to eat better or treat yourself, we've got a seasonal menu of craveable options.

WINTER BREAK HOURS December 12th - January 8th CLOSED
Fall Quarter 2016 Monday - Thursday: 7:30 am - 8:00 pm Friday: 7:30 am - 5:00 pm Saturday & Sunday: Closed
*Hours of operation are subject to change for observed holidays and breaks.

Located in between Steinhaus Hall and Howard Schneiderman Lecture Hall (HSLH), BC's Cavern overlooks the beautiful Aldrich Park and is a perfect place enjoy a delicious hot meal while studying or grab a fresh sandwich from Subway while on your way to class

Located just across East Peltason from Middle Earth Housing, Bridge Café is a We Proudly Serve Starbucks that offers a variety of beverages and pastries. This coffee house is a must-visit for any student on the East side of Ring Road near Social Ecology or Engineering.

WINTER BREAK HOURS December 12th - January 8th CLOSED
Fall Quarter 2016 Monday - Thursday: 7:30 am - 9:00 pm Friday: 7:30 am - 5:00 pm Saturday & Sunday: Closed
*Hours of operation are subject to change for observed holidays and breaks.
UCI Social Science Plaza A Irvine , CA 92617

Stop by your one-stop-shop for all things necessary for collegiate success! Whether it be a grab-n-go item between classes or health and beauty essentials, the C3 store has it all. Enjoy convenience to the 3rd power!

WINTER BREAK HOURS December 12th - January 8th CLOSED
Fall Quarter 2016 Monday - Thursday: 7:30 am - 7:00 pm Friday: 7:30 am - 4:00 pm Saturday & Sunday: Closed

Cyber A Café proudly serves Java City ecoGrounds beverages, an assortment of tasty pastries and a number of hearty and healthy food options, such as sandwiches and wraps. Cyber A Café sits cozily in the heart of the School of the Arts.

1200 A Medical Education Bldg Irvine, CA 92697

Med Ed Café proudly serves Starbucks coffee. Create your own hand-crafted beverage or try one of our recommendations! Med Ed Café also offers an assortment of pastries and grab 'n go items to satisfy your cravings.

Taza, located at the brand new Anteatery in Mesa Court, offers up the best of Java City's ecoGrounds coffee and espresso beverages and delicious, warm pastries. A perfect place to visit before or after an event at the Bren or class near Humanities or the Arts.

The Anteatery is one of three all-you-can-eat dining halls on campus featuring Mongolian grill, fresh salad & fruit from the Farmer's Market, stone oven pizza along with favorites such as the grill, ice cream bar and fresh baked pastries

*Hours of operation are subject to change for observed holidays and breaks.

Phoenix Food Court is home to a variety of places to eat, including Greens to Go, Tortilla Fresca, Grille Works and Einstein Bros. Bagels. Phoenix Food Court, located next to Social Science Tower and Inner Ring Road, boasts a great view of Aldrich Park to take in the scenery as you enjoy your meal.
